scripts.build-i18n: npm run build-i18n:en && npm run build-i18n:pl
scripts.build-i18n-github: (if exist docs rmdir /q/s docs) && npm run build-i18n:en:github && copy docs\index.html docs\404.html
scripts.build-i18n-watch: start npm run build-i18n:en:watch && start npm run build-i18n:pl:watch
scripts.bi: (if exist dist rmdir /q/s dist) && npm run build-i18n
scripts.biw: (if exist dist rmdir /q/s dist) && start npm run build-i18n:en:watch && start npm run build-i18n:pl:watch
scripts.biws: (if exist dist rmdir /q/s dist) && node z_js_util_files\__watch_serve_local.js
scripts.a: (if exist dist rmdir /q/s dist) && node z_js_util_files\__setver patch && npm run build-i18n && firebase deploy
scripts.ag: (if exist dist rmdir /q/s dist) && node z_js_util_files\__setver patch && npm run build-i18n && npm run build-i18n-github && firebase deploy
scripts.am: (if exist dist rmdir /q/s dist) && node z_js_util_files\__setver minor && npm run build-i18n && firebase deploy
scripts.aM: (if exist dist rmdir /q/s dist) && node z_js_util_files\__setver major && npm run build-i18n && firebase deploy
scripts.ua: yarn upgrade && (if exist dist rmdir /q/s dist) && node z_js_util_files\__setver patch && npm run build-i18n && firebase deploy
scripts.uam: yarn upgrade && (if exist dist rmdir /q/s dist) && node z_js_util_files\__setver minor && npm run build-i18n && firebase deploy
scripts.uaM: yarn upgrade && (if exist dist rmdir /q/s dist) && node z_js_util_files\__setver major && npm run build-i18n && firebase deploy
